is-relative

Returns true if the path appears to be relative.

Install

Install with npm:

npm i is-relative --save-dev

Usage

Example:

var isRelative = require('is-relative');
isRelative('test/fixtures/docs/new/file.txt');
//=> true
  • filepath {String}: Path to test.
  • return {Boolean}

Author
